products.name: Apple iPhone 13 Pro
products.description: The iPhone 13 Pro features a stunning Super Retina XDR display, a powerful A15 Bionic chip, and an advanced triple-camera system for capturing amazing photos and videos.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra
products.description: The Galaxy S21 Ultra is a powerful smartphone with a stunning Dynamic AMOLED display, a versatile quad-camera system, and an intelligent S Pen for enhanced productivity.

products.name: Sony PlayStation 5
products.description: The PlayStation 5 is a next-generation gaming console with lightning-fast loading times, immersive 3D audio, and stunning 4K visuals, providing an unparalleled gaming experience.

products.name: Canon EOS R5
products.description: The Canon EOS R5 is a professional full-frame mirrorless camera with a high-resolution sensor, advanced autofocus capabilities, and 8K video recording, delivering exceptional image quality and performance.

products.name: Apple MacBook Pro 16
products.description: The MacBook Pro 16 is a powerful laptop with a stunning Retina display, an efficient M1 Pro chip, and an immersive audio system, making it the ultimate tool for creatives and professionals.
